item.title: Microservices and discipline
item.description: Suppose you have a problem: you’ve got beautiful opportunity to spent 30 hours over 3 days with Chris Ricahrdson author of microservices patterns, and you need no use this opportunity to ask one of founding fathers of our current understanding “how to make good software”. Here’s what I’m going to ask and why. Stay tuned.
